description: Students are required to write an academic thesis on an approved topic under the guidance of a supervisor. The HT will be equivalent to two modules of study.
title: Honours Thesis
prerequisite:
Cohort 2012-2015:
Completed 110 MCs including 60 MCs of JS major requirements with a minimum CAP of 3.50.

Cohort 2016 onwards:
Completed 110 MCs including 44 MCs of JS major requirements with a minimum CAP of 3.50.
